document_data.name: Karzon Kul
document_data.mainbody: '''Karzon Kul''' was a ruffian [[dwarf]] from [[Loudwater]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Description: Karzon's head was shaved, and he had tattoos across his body.
document_data.Personality: Karzon Kul was a local ruffian who usually hanged out at the [[Fisher's Friend Pub]] in Loudwater, and had a reputation for starting fights with other patrons.
document_data.Relationships: Karzon was an ally of the [[Lady of Shadows]], leader of the crime gang in Loudwater in the late 15th century.
